title: Life in the Spirit: Prophets, Apostles, Evangelists, Pastors
itunes:title: Life in the Spirit: Prophets, Apostles, Evangelists, Pastors
description: In his letter to the Ephesians, Paul specifies some of the great charismatic offices, including prophets who boldly speak the word, apostles who establish churches, evangelists who draw others to Christ, and pastors who order and manage the community of the faithful. Which office is yours?
content:encoded: In his letter to the Ephesians, Paul specifies some of the great charismatic offices, including prophets who boldly speak the word, apostles who establish churches, evangelists who draw others to Christ, and pastors who order and manage the community of the faithful. Which office is yours?

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
